蛒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gé］
［《廣韻》古伯切，入陌，見。］
(1)毒蜂。
(2)金龟子的幼虫。俗称地蚕。
[②]［luò］
［《集韻》歷各切，入鐸，來。］
见“蛒2”。

蛒字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛒； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1081第14
【唐韻】古伯切【集韻】各頟切，?音格。【揚子·方言】蠀螬，梁、益之閒謂之蛒，或謂之蛭蛒。【博雅】蛭蛒，蚰蜒也。　又蛄諸謂之杜蛒。　又【集韻】轄格切，音胳。義同。

蛒字的源字形

蛒字的起名意思

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gé］
["Guangyun" Gu Boqie, enter the Mo, see. ]
(1) Venomous bee.
(2) The larva of beetle. Commonly known as ground silkworm.
[②]［luò］
["Jiyun" go through each cut, enter the duo, come. ]
See "蛒2".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛒; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1081 Page 14
[Tang Yun] Gu Boqie 【Ji Yun】Each 頟切,? Phonetic pattern. 【Yangtze Dialect】Zizi, Liang and Yizhixian are called guts, or leeches. 【Bo Ya】Leech worms, scorpions are also.　And the du 蛒 of all the so-called.　[Jiyun] Jurisdiction, sound arm. The same meaning.
